beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #23. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #23. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of bakers chocolate, black walnut, light wood smoke, and sticky toffee.
beers.beer: More Grisly Than Ever In Blood Color
beers.description: Imperial Squash Porter. 8.5% Brewed with a plethora of specialty and roasted malts, local wildflower honey, and house roasted butternut squash from Lancaster. Gently hopped in the kettle with UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast.
beers.summary:
Imperial Squash Porter. 8.5% Brewed with a plethora of specialty and roasted malts, local wildflower honey, and house roasted butternut squash from Lancaster. Gently hopped in the kettle with UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast.
Notes of bakers chocolate, black walnut, light wood smoke, and sticky toffee.

beers.notes: Notes of pumpkin pie filling, blueberry strudel, graham cracker, and chai latte (In-House only).
beers.description: Double Milkshake IPA. 9.2% Sweet Potato Casserole Double Milkshake is the latest heavily amplified psychedelic riff on THE boundary-pushing Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats, sweet potatoes, marshmallow, cinnamon, brown sugar, and lactose sugar. Conditioned atop luscious Madagascar vanilla beans, sweet potato puree, marshmallow, and toasted pecans. Intensely hopped and then dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra. Dreamt up with our eternal cloud angel life mates at Omnipollo!
beers.summary:
Double Milkshake IPA. 9.2% Sweet Potato Casserole Double Milkshake is the latest heavily amplified psychedelic riff on THE boundary-pushing Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats, sweet potatoes, marshmallow, cinnamon, brown sugar, and lactose sugar. Conditioned atop luscious Madagascar vanilla beans, sweet potato puree, marshmallow, and toasted pecans. Intensely hopped and then dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra. Dreamt up with our eternal cloud angel life mates at Omnipollo!
Notes of pumpkin pie filling, blueberry strudel, graham cracker, and chai latte (In-House only).

beers.notes: Notes of bursting kiwi, guava smoothie, strawberry, and dried apricot.
beers.description: Hay and Spicebush Saison. 5.1% Brewed with oats, foraged spicebush from Jeans farm and alfalfa hay. Gently hopped in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented in stainless with our magickal saison yeast.
beers.summary:
Hay and Spicebush Saison. 5.1% Brewed with oats, foraged spicebush from Jeans farm and alfalfa hay. Gently hopped in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented in stainless with our magickal saison yeast.
Notes of bursting kiwi, guava smoothie, strawberry, and dried apricot.

beers.notes: Notes of blueberry scone, fresh linen, cranberry reduction, and brisk prosecco.
beers.description: Tiny IPA 3.5% Brewed with 100% raw barley that was grown in our spent grain by our dear comrades at Two Particular Acres. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Cascade. Dry hopped with an embarrassing amount of German Cascade and Motueka.
beers.summary:
Tiny IPA 3.5% Brewed with 100% raw barley that was grown in our spent grain by our dear comrades at Two Particular Acres. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Cascade. Dry hopped with an embarrassing amount of German Cascade and Motueka.
Notes of blueberry scone, fresh linen, cranberry reduction, and brisk prosecco.

beers.notes: Notes of overripe kiwi, French charentais melon, CBD gummies, and lime leaf.
beers.description: Spelt IPA. 6.2% IPA brewed with heaps of spelt. Assertively hopped in the kettle with the almighty Simcoe. Aggressively dry hopped with even more Simcoe and Jean's hand selected Pacific Jade from New Zealand.
beers.summary:
Spelt IPA. 6.2% IPA brewed with heaps of spelt. Assertively hopped in the kettle with the almighty Simcoe. Aggressively dry hopped with even more Simcoe and Jean's hand selected Pacific Jade from New Zealand.
Notes of overripe kiwi, French charentais melon, CBD gummies, and lime leaf.

beers.notes: rewed entirely with German pilsner malt and whole local lobsters. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and Chamomile flowers. Fermented and lagered in stainless for many moons. Gently dry hopped with more Strisselspalt and a touch of Czech Kazbek.
beers.summary:
Lobster Chamomile Lager. 4.2%
rewed entirely with German pilsner malt and whole local lobsters. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and Chamomile flowers. Fermented and lagered in stainless for many moons. Gently dry hopped with more Strisselspalt and a touch of Czech Kazbek.

beers.beer: -Notes of coconut macaroon, fall baking spices, cranberry honey, and brisk ocean breeze.
